personalInfo.family: Wife, Ana Milena; Christopher (1996), Joel Jacobo (2008)
personalInfo.splInterest: Enjoys watching sports on TV, especially football and Spain's Barcelona Football Club

tourBios.intlVics: (2): 2000 Colombian Open. 2012 International Open La Vitalicia [TLA].
tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned his card by finishing in a T15 at the Qualifying Tournament played at the CC La Planicie in Lima, Peru.
tourBios.carHigh:
2012: As a fully-exempt member on the Latinoamérica, played six events but made only one cut and was unable to keep his card. His best finish was a 49th-place performance at the Colombian Coffee Classic in Cali. 

2011: Earned his 2012 Tour card as the 27th-ranked player from the Tour de las Americas' Order of Merit.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was T45th in 2013 at the TransAmerican Power Products CRV Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T64th in Total Eagles on the Latinoamérica.
